summary: Love the look of elven but wish it came in heavy?  This mod is for you.  Recolor of the vanilla elven armor, also making it standalone and heavy type (including shield) and modified stats to match a heavy set.  Both male and female, works with CBBE.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod!  


>FEATURES<
>>Recolor of the vanilla elven armor
>>Fully craftable and improvable- slightly edited recipe materials, includes a little malachite
>>Standalone set (does NOT replace the regular elven armor set)
>>Heavy type (including shield) and modified stats to match a heavy set
********The armor rating is about in between daedric and dragonplate
>>Both male and female
>>Works with CBBE


PLEASE let me know if you have any issues with the file, I\'d be happy to update it.  Read below for instructions on installation.  For beginners (or anyone, I use it myself) I highly recommend the Nexus Mod Manager.  Very convenient and it\'ll get all your files installed in the right place.  


>>Installation>>
I recommend the mod manager download, but if you want to do it manually...
1.   Place the \'.esp\' file in your C:\\Program Files\\Skyrim\\Data (or wherever you have skyrim installed) 
2.   Place the meshes and textures folders in the Data file (MERGE with currently existing folders), this should place the textures/meshes in Data/meshes/armor/elvenrune/...


>>Uninstall<< 
1.  Remove the same files above!  (folders labeled elvenrune in both meshes and textures, and delete the .esp)


Made using NifScope, Photoshop, Skyedit and CK files.


Thanks:
Bethesda for game and CK
Lateraliss for tutorial on standalone armor
author: Novamuse
